rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0001
rows.name: I can feel him... Metsu is just ahead.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0002
rows.name:
So it's finally time
for the last battle.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0003
rows.name:
What's the plan?
We have to decide
if we're settling this now.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0004
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0005
rows.name: Proceed to the final battle?

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0006
rows.name: Yes

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0007
rows.name: No

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0008
rows.name:
I understand.
I agree, that's what we should do.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0009
rows.name:
Your Majesty, fight without worry.
Kagutsuchi and I will have your back.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0010
rows.name:
Yes. It is our duty
as the Jewels of Superbia.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0011
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0012
rows.name:
I can't lose until I've written about
the battle with Metsu in my journal.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0013
rows.name: There's no way we'll lose.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0014
rows.name:
So confident.
Just what you'd expect
from the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0015
rows.name:
That's right. I'm a Heaven's Holy Grail
too, equal to Metsu. That means with all
of you by my side, I'm the stronger one.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0016
rows.name:
There's no way I'm losing
to a guy who's all by himself.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0017
rows.name: You've changed... quite a bit, Hikari.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0018
rows.name:
R-really? Must be my Driver's
bad influence.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0019
rows.name:
Not at all. We're about to go see
a real example of a bad
influence right now.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0020
rows.name:
You've got a way with words.
For a second there, I almost felt
sorry for the Deacon Cardinal.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0021
rows.name:
But I agree with Minochi-sama.
I can't imagine if someone like that
was my Driver...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0022
rows.name:
Yeah...
We're lucky to be Laura's Blades.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0023
rows.name: And us, your friends, too.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0024
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0025
rows.name: Shin... Everyone...

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0026
rows.name:
Okay, let's go! We'll beat Metsu
together, and come home together...
back to Satahiko and Milt!

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0027
rows.name:
It's a prudent decision,
but the right one.

rows.label: fev11_740_150_msg0028
rows.name:
Right. We can't afford to lose.
Let's make sure we're fully
prepared before we go.
